p: The similarity index suggests that the simulated and observed maps reached 70% of the similarity within a window of three cells and 90% within nine cells. According to the figures of merit (Pontius et al. 2008; Pontius and Millones 2011), the κ value is 94%, with disagreement values of allocation and quantity of 4% and 1%, respectively. Agricultural cover shows the highest disagreement, while other covers show the highest omission error (Fig. 3). Scrubland and tropical dry forest were the natural covers that showed the highest performance in modelling.
